review: *** ***** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ************* I have ever taken my child to! She actually cares about the kids she treats. She is very on top of things. it was wonderful to find such a loving and caring pediatrician for my son. *** ***** ** ***** *** ** *** **** ************ ****** **** **** **** She was very sweet and warm to my son and was wonderful. I would recommend her to other parents for their children to come and see for any medical issues they may have.  *** ** *** **** ************ * **** ***** **** ** ******** Dr. Sufla Saxena was easy to talk to, did an excellent job answering all of my questions, and I really appreciate the time she spent with us. She clicked a pic also with my son..n my son was super happyvwith this gesture. So Thank you Dr. Sufla..you are really awesome. üòçüòä

**** **** ******* ************* *** have a new age approach towards children and their issues. She has recently diagnosed my son's digestion related issues and suggested a healthy and much needed change in his diet plan and lifestyle (exercise and sleep) . We as parents at times know what is wrong with our children but we do not work at it unless we hear it from a wise person. Speaking to Dr. Saxena gave us that realization how we should handle this situation. Even our son who never took his diet and activities seriously understood its importance after listening to doctor he has also reduced his screen time and is involved more in physical activity and eating what is good for him( in right amount, at right time). Now he even sleeps on time. :-) A big thank you to Dr. Sufla Saxena.

I went to Dr Sufla Saxena for treatment of my son Anirudh 6 yrs aged having complain of stomach pain for last one month.  Before going to her I visited three pediatric Doctors but no fruitful results.  With some test and medicines she started treatment and I found speedy recovery of my son within week. Now my son is perfectly okay. The way she treated my son in not only admirable but also shows her professionalism. I strongly recommend everyone whose children are suffering from any gastro related problem.  I also want to say thanks to Doctor.

I would say that we are so fortunate that we met Dr. Sufla Saxena. We came to India from US in September 2020 for a short trip and we met Dr. Sufla Saxena for our daughter Advika's rashes and itching. My daughter was  2.5 years old with 8.6 kgs of weight. Doctors in US initially declared that she has food allergy and put her on a gluten free, dairy free and nuts free diet. After one year when we asked for her allergy test then allergy was not at all detected and then doctors starting calling it food sensitivity.
When we consulted Dr. Sufla Saxena, she did her through investigation and made a plan to start some supplement along with regular food, her startegy worked so well that my daughter is now on regular diet without any additional vitamins or tonic and gaining weight.
I would say that it is all because of Dr. Sufla Saxena who gave us proper guidance and confidence that my daughter is now doing great. 
Thank you Dr. Sufla Saxena !

review:
Hi ..i would like to review for god like doctor
We visited so many doctors but she was not getting relief of stomach pain from last one month 
She was restricted to milk since age 2 and hence had low immunity n weight issues,with in 2 weeks she got relief and now focusing on real issue of constipation
My daughter is happy able to have variety f food
With closed eyes i would highly recommend to visit an amazing doctor
Thank you mam 
Can't thank enuf

review: My daughter is suffering from Pancreatitis and was ill. Dr.Sufla Saxena has helped and treated my daughter very well and I am totally satisfied. She always encouraged and supported my daughter. She has a  positive outlook to everything which helped the patient as well as the family members to be calm. thank you ma‚Äôam for everything you did.  I will be grateful to you.

Hello everyone, 
This is im writing from bottom of my heart.
I actually cried for my son and afrer meeting with Dr Sufla Saxena (recommended by someone) I detailed out whole process of my son of 3 years tummy pain issue, not accepting anything. And when i came out i was so positive about everything. She immediately changed entire concept and hit the right point of treatment.
Words are falling short to thanks her. *** ** **** **** **** **** Thank you so much Doctor. üôè

A BIG,Heartfelt Thanks to Dr Sufla Saxena for patiently hearing me out,while on her off days,for my kid who was miserable for the past 3 days ....the gynae meds were not working at all ..spoke to Doc Sufla on a friend‚Äôs recommendation ....She was not only a very experienced and comforting doctor but  seemed to be a great human being too ...her assurance helped a lot in the recovery ....My daughter was totally fine just in a Day üôè

I consulted Dr. Sufla Saxena for my daughter Kaavya. She had been complaining of lower abdominal pain combined with headache just after her recovery from Covid. Mam listened to us very patiently and advised good medicines for gastrointestinal issues basis her diagnosis for Kaavya. She also spoke to my daughter that comforted her. Gradually after more than 20 days of treatment, this is still in progress, we can see lot of positive difference in my daughter's wellbeing and her Abdominal pains have also reduced to large extent. The good part is that Mam is very easily approachable and kids feel homely after meeting her.This was my daughter's feedback after we physically met the doctor on one of our visits to Manipal Hospital. I would strongly recommend her treatment in case of children.thank you so much.Gaurav Kankaria

*** ***** ****** ** **** **** ******* They have cured my 6 year old son.My son used to have constipation problem since long time, wo did not go latrine even for 6 days.I showed him to many doctors but always got disappointment Then I read about Dr. Sufla Saxena on Google, I thought that once you meet him too. You will not believe his behavior is very good, he talks very lovingly and all the problems of the child Considering the problem, started my treatment. Now my son is cured. I thank Dr. Sufla Saxena ji from the bottom of my heart.
